turns.content: Provide the top 10 digital activities for sales conversions from an eCommerce website that a manufacturer/wholesaler of foul weather clothing could use to increase revenues

Sure, here are the top 10 digital activities for sales conversions that a manufacturer/wholesaler of foul weather clothing could use to increase revenues:

1. Implementing a User-Friendly E-Commerce Website: Create a user-friendly e-commerce website that is easy to navigate and provides detailed product descriptions, high-quality product images, and pricing information.
2. Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Optimize your website for search engines so that your website appears at the top of search engine results when potential customers search for products related to foul weather clothing.
3. Social Media Marketing: Promote your products on social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to your website.
4. Email Marketing: Use email marketing to reach out to potential and existing customers with offers, promotions, and discounts.
5. Influencer Marketing: Partner with influencers in the outdoor and adventure space to showcase your products and increase brand awareness.
6. Content Marketing: Create useful and informative content such as blog posts, videos, and infographics to attract potential customers and increase engagement with your brand.
7. Retargeting Ads: Use retargeting ads to reach out to potential customers who have visited your website but have not made a purchase.
8. Customer Reviews and Testimonials: Encourage customers to leave reviews and testimonials on your website or third-party review websites to increase social proof and build trust with potential customers.
9. Live Chat Support: Offer live chat support on your website to help potential customers with any questions they may have about your products.
10. Abandoned Cart Recovery: Use tools that allow you to automatically send follow-up emails to customers who have abandoned their shopping carts to remind them of the products they were interested in and encourage them to complete their purchase.
